channel.title: Problem With Running Java
channel.description:
I recently accidentally reset my Windows Firewall's Exceptions list back to it's defaults. Now everytime I run Runescape or a chat that uses java (www.serebii.net/chat.shtml for an example) the page loads the images, and as soon as it hits the Java part the internet page just closes.
I have Windows XP, Windows Firewall, Java Environment 6.0, JDK 6.0
What do I do make the internet fully run the java instead of closing the page as soon as it detects Java.

item.title: Problem With Running Java
item.dc:creator: @ImmortalKaine ImmortalKaine
item.description:

I have Windows XP, Windows Firewall, Java Environment 6.0, JDK 6.0

What do I do make the internet fully run the java instead of closing the page as soon as it detects Java.
